metadata.name: Stat and Achievement Shenanigans
metadata.description:
This mod requires REPENTOGON. Press the tilde key to open the new debug console and menu. There's a new Shenanigans option that will let you view/modify stats and achievements.
The data here is presented very simply. Look [url=https://repentogon.com/enums/EventCounter.html]here[/url] to find out more information about each of the stats. Look [url=https://bindingofisaacrebirth.fandom.com/wiki/Achievements]here[/url] to find out more information about each of the achievements.
If anything doesn't seem to be saving, try starting and exiting a new run.
You can also import/export all your data. When you set a field, it can trigger another field. Make sure to look over your data after performing a bulk import. If something seems wrong, a second import may fix it.
The import JSON uses this format for modded achievements: "M-{achievementName}{modId}". If you remove "M-", this is the same format you'll find in Repentogon's achievementsX.json files which are located here: C:\Users\username\Documents\My Games\Binding of Isaac Repentance+\Repentogon
Modded achievements are now supported.
This is a companion mod to: [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3130836503]Character Shenanigans[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2932859748]Win Streak Shenanigans[/url] [/list]
